alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 18 at 10:49AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Montana, including the following counties, Beaverhead and Madison. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1049 AM MST, emergency management reported an ice jam near the advisory area. Minor flooding is already occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dillon, Twin Bridges, Alder and Beaverhead Rock State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
